lead_paragraph: The U.S. International Trade Commission said on Friday it had made a final finding that the U.S. industry was being harmed by the dumping and subsidization of imports of carbon and alloy steel cut-to-length plate from China.
snippet: The U.S. International Trade Commission said on Friday it had made a final finding that the U.S. industry was being harmed by the dumping and subsidization of imports of carbon and alloy steel cut-to-length plate from China....

headline.main: U.S. Finds China Steel Plate Imports Injure U.S. Industry
headline.print_headline: U.S. Finds China Steel Plate Imports Injure U.S. Industry
